name: Minify
tagline: A python script to minify jss and css files
body:
### Introduction A python script to minify jss and css files on the fly using yui compressor. ###Usage 
minify.py [-h] [--all | --js | --css | --clear] [--jspath JSPATH] [--csspath CSSPATH] [--opath OPATH]
Optional Arguments : 
 -h, --help   :   Show help message and exit
 --all        :   Minify all js and css files
 --js         :   Minify only js files
 --css        :   Minify only css files
 --clear      :   Clear all minified files
Paths : describe input and output paths 
--jspath JSPATH   : Path for js files
--csspath CSSPATH : Path for css files
--opath OPATH     : Path for output files

$> python minify.py --all
$> python minify.py --jspath "/Users/hkasera/Downloads/" --opath "/Users/hkasera/Desktop/"
### License In case you find this useful, please feel free to use this in any way. You need to just make sure that you keep the copyright notice and license. (MIT)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
